A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's long but it doesn't seem like it because of the strong narrative. And the humour added some light relief. Adam Driver is excellent as Kylo Ren and it is a fitting farewell to Carrie Fisher as Princess Leia. This is all part of an obvious quest to widen its audience\, which die-hard fans have criticised. Hopefully what seemed like superfluous plot sections will have their worth become apparent in alter movies.
